âœ¨ On this International Women's Day, I want to take a moment to express my gratitude to the amazing women who have been a part of my professional life. Your support, guidance and friendships mean the world to me. ğŸŒŸ Today, as we celebrate the achievements and contributions of women worldwide, I want to shout out each and every one of you for the invaluable role you've played in my life. ğŸ’« Here's to the incredible women who continue to shape and redefine what it means to be leaders, friends, and allies! ğŸ“£ Attention ~ Early Talent / University Recruiting folks!! ğŸ¡ If you are hiring interns this summer, Ohana Subleasing Co. (Neo '23) would love to help them find housing for free! ğŸŒŸ Their goal is to help college students in 6 cities (NYC, SF / Bay Area, Seattle, LA, DC, and Pittsburgh) save $10M in rent this summer by subleasing to interns. ğŸ“œ They created city-specific welcome guides to help 2024 #interns find housing and make the most of their summer. ğŸ’¥ Feel free to share these guides with your interns for free! (Duolingo, Atlassian, Oracle, and others are already sharing these Ohana welcome guides)! ğŸ  SF / Bay Area: https://lnkd.in/ekbreuDp ğŸ  NYC: https://lnkd.in/eDWq95Bd ğŸ  Pittsburgh: https://lnkd.in/eUYi-CAY ğŸ  Seattle: https://lnkd.in/ecNtYWqa ğŸ  DC: https://lnkd.in/e8Vywti8 ğŸ™ If you'd love to connect with the team and learn more - feel free to connect with Ezra Gershanok and Jacob Ian Halbert! #UniversityRecruiting #EarlyTalent #InternProgram #InternHousing
